info.description:
Mercedes-Benz Vietnam Ltd. (MBV) produces and sells passenger cars and commercial cars in Vietnam.

The Mercedes-Benz Vietnam Ltd. factory is located in Go Vap District, Ho Chi Minh City. The factory covers 105,000 square meters and has a production capacity of about 3,500 vehicles per year.

The factory includes a Training Center, which carries out sales, marketing and technical training courses to ensure a high level of employee competence.

Mercedes-Benz Vietnam has achieved certificates of ISO/TS 16949:2009 and ISO 9001:2008 in Quality Management System and furthermore ISO 14001:2004 in Environmental Management System.

Vision
 

Mercedes-Benz Vietnam takes all endeavours to be the most successful car producer in combination with highly efficient customer oriented support.

The basis to fulfill this are permanently optimization and constant innovations to get the efficient processes which are the result for the outstanding quality Mercedes-Benz is known for all over the world.

This can only be achieved by skilled employees who can fullfill our high standards through regularly training activities of our company.

Only because of this preconditions our excellent customer service is possible and can rounding our product offers.

The mentioned activities are the reason why Mercedes-Benz set up world-class quality standards and they are the keystones of our success. To satisfy our customer and to exceed their expectations is our goal.
 
 
Mission
 

We aim to delight our customers constantly with our high quality standards, with our innovative products and with an outstanding services anytime, resulting from the excellence of our processes and people.
 
 
Basic aims / Strategic goals
 

We want to meet and exceed our customers expectations and satisfaction, create a atmosphere for motivated and team oriented workforce.

Therefore we are keen to improve our skills, the skills of our workforce and our sense of professionalism continuously.
